description: This file defines a mock class RfcMock for unit testing purposes, referencing functions related to RFC parameters. It includes mock method declarations for getRFCParameter, setRFCParameter, and getRFCErrorString.

classes.name: RfcMock
classes.description: A mock class for Rfc-related operations used in testing, inheriting from MockUtils and providing mocked methods for RFC parameter get/set operations and error string retrieval.

methods.name: getRFCParameter
methods.description: Mocked method to simulate retrieving an RFC parameter.

methods.name: setRFCParameter
methods.description: Mocked method to simulate setting an RFC parameter.

methods.name: getRFCErrorString
methods.description: Mocked method to retrieve string representation of an RFC status error.
